mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_message ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, admin_user_id, knowledge_id, content) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{adminUserId}, #{knowledgeId}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, admin_user_id AS adminUserId, knowledge_id AS knowledgeId, content FROM b_message WHERE knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId} ORDER BY gmt_create ASC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_message WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
